purpleculture_pinyin:
lǒu
to hug; to embrace; to hold in one's arms
обнимать; обнять; держать на руках

lōu
to draw towards oneself; to gather; to gather up (one's gown, sleeves etc); to grab (money); to extort
притягивать к себе; собирать; собрать (халат, рукава и т. д.); схватить (деньги); вымогать
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 搂)
Pictophonetic: 婁 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
摟抱 [ lǒu bào ]: to hug; to embrace
摟住 [ lǒu zhù ]: to hold in one's arms; to embrace
摟錢 [ lōu qián ]: (coll.) to grab money; to rake in money

    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 婁 [ lóu ] a constellation; to wear; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: The captain of the flying dutchman's bride loves to wrap her fingers around her soon to be husband and give him a good cuddle.
Ru_trainchinese:
lǒu: (глаг) обнимать, держать в объятиях, обхватывать руками
lōu: (глаг) собирать, сгребать вместе; выколачивать, вымогать (деньги); засучивать, подбирать (подол); взводить (курок)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The bride loves to wrap her fingers around her soon to be husband and give him a good cuddle.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand " to " lou " sound. The original meaning is to draw in and draw in. "Said Wen": "Hug, drag together. From the hand, Lou Sheng." Such as "Mencius. "Gaozixia": "Five tyrants, and those who hold the princes to defeat the princes." Liu Zongyuan of the Tang Dynasty (Jin Wen): "Take great gains to self-reliance, and the power of others to strengthen oneself, and the people are Hou Yan. "

The extension of " hug " means to gather together. "Er Ya. On Shiguo: "Hold, gather together." Guo Pu's note: "Hold, as today's words are restrained, gather together." Such as "Water Margin" Chapter 38: "Li Kui did not agree to him, so he took prisoner underground. I robbed them of a dozen or so silver dollars that others had gambled on, all in their pockets." "Awakening Marriage" Chapter 27: "Suddenly encountered a famine, and adults have food. I saw this fierceness. In the deserted scene, hiding and refusing to go out, and the little man has no food to eat, why don't you scrape the bark, pick the leaves, sweep the grass, dig the roots?

" Hug " later also said to hug. For example, Chapter 8 of "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms": "She was embarrassed, repeated leaning on the halberd, turned around and hugged Diao Chan, and comforted with kind words." Chapter 40 of "Dream of Red Mansions": "Baoyu rolled into Jia's mother's arms early, and Jia's mother smiled. Baoyu is called heart and liver."
humanum_short_description_en: From " hand " to " lou " sound. The original meaning is to draw in and draw in.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「婁」聲。本義是牽合、拉攏。《說文》：「摟，曳聚也。从手，婁聲。」如《孟子．告子下》：「五霸者，摟諸侯以伐諸侯者也。」唐代柳宗元〈晉問〉：「引大利以自嚮，而摟他人之力以自為固，而民乃後焉。」

　　「摟」引申表示聚攏。《爾雅．釋詁上》：「摟，聚也。」郭璞注：「摟，猶今言拘摟，聚也。」如《水滸全傳》第38回：「李逵也不答應他，便就地下擄了銀子，又搶了別人賭的十來兩銀子，都摟在布衫兜裏。」《醒世姻緣》第27回：「卒然遇了荒年，大人家有糧食的，看了這個凶荒景象，藏住了不肯出糶，小人家又沒有糧食得吃，說甚麼不刮樹皮，摟樹葉，掃草子，掘草根？」

　　「摟」後來還表示摟抱。如《三國演義》第8回：「布羞慚滿面，重復倚戟，回身摟抱貂蟬，用好言安慰。」《紅樓夢》第40回：「寶玉早滾到賈母懷裏，賈母笑的摟著寶玉叫心肝。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「婁」聲。本義是牽合、拉攏。

Chinese: The captain of the flying dutchman's bride loves to wrap her fingers around her soon to be husband and give him a good cuddle.
Meaning: cuddle
Hanzi: 搂
Story: The bride loves to wrap her fingers around her soon to be husband and give him a good cuddle.
Kind: traditional

從「 手 」，「 婁 」聲。本義是牽合、拉攏。《說文》：「摟，曳聚也。从手，婁聲。」如《孟子．告子下》：「五霸者，摟諸侯以伐諸侯者也。」唐代柳宗元〈晉問〉：「引大利以自嚮，而摟他人之力以自為固，而民乃後焉。」 「 摟 」引申表示聚攏。《爾雅．釋詁上》：「摟，聚也。」郭璞注：「摟，猶今言拘摟，聚也。」如《水滸全傳》第38回：「李逵也不答應他，便就地下擄了銀子，又搶了別人賭的十來兩銀子，都摟在布衫兜裏。」《醒世姻緣》第27回：「卒然遇了荒年，大人家有糧食的，看了這個凶荒景象，藏住了不肯出糶，小人家又沒有糧食得吃，說甚麼不刮樹皮，摟樹葉，掃草子，掘草根？」 「 摟 」後來還表示摟抱。如《三國演義》第8回：「布羞慚滿面，重復倚戟，回身摟抱貂蟬，用好言安慰。」《紅樓夢》第40回：「寶玉早滾到賈母懷裏，賈母笑的摟著寶玉叫心肝。」

"Gaozixia": "Five tyrants, and those who hold the princes to defeat the princes." Liu Zongyuan of the Tang Dynasty (Jin Wen): "Take great gains to self-reliance, and the power of others to strengthen oneself, and the people are Hou Yan. " The extension of " hug" means to gather together. "Er Ya. On Shiguo: "Hold, gather together." Guo Pu's note: "Hold, as today's words are restrained, gather together." Such as "Water Margin" Chapter 38: "Li Kui did not agree to him, so he took prisoner underground. I robbed them of a dozen or so silver dollars that others had gambled on, all in their pockets." "Awakening Marriage" Chapter 27: "Suddenly encountered a famine, and adults have food. I saw this fierceness. In the deserted scene, hiding and refusing to go out, and the little man has no food to eat, why don't you scrape the bark, pick the leaves, sweep the grass, dig the roots? " Hug" later also said to hug. For example, Chapter 8 of "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms": "She was embarrassed, repeated leaning on the halberd, turned around and hugged Diao Chan, and comforted with kind words." 摟字的基本解释

摟
lǒu

摟
lōu
均见“搂”。

摟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lōu］
［《廣韻》落侯切，平侯，來。］
［《廣韻》力朱切，平虞，來。］
“搂1”的繁体字。
(1)挟持；拉。
(2)把东西向自己面前聚集。
(3)指向自己的方向拨，扳。
(4)搜刮。
(5)见“摟搜”。
(6)招揽。参见“摟包”。
(7)撩；挽。
(8)抚琴的指法之一。
(9)核算。参见“摟算”、“摟賬”。
(10)锄地。
[②]［lǒu］
［《正字通》郎斗切］
“搂2”的繁体字。
(1)搂抱，用胳膊拢着。
(2)用为量词。

摟字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摟； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页450第09
【唐韻】洛侯切【集韻】【韻會】郞侯切【正韻】盧侯切，?音樓。【說文】曳聚也。爾雅摟聚也。註猶今言拘摟聚也。又牽也。《孟子》踰東家牆而摟其處子。又五霸者摟諸侯以伐諸侯者也。　又【唐韻】力朱切【集韻】龍朱切，?音蔞。亦曳也。一曰挽使申也。通作婁。

考證：〔【說文】曳聚也。又牽也。㩜取也。【孟子】五伯者，摟諸侯以伐諸侯者也。 又【揚子·方言】袌持謂之摟。【孟子】踰東家牆而摟其處子。〕　謹按袌持謂之摟。揚子方言無此語。又孟子兩摟字趙註俱訓爲牽。謹將又牽也至摟其處子改爲：爾雅摟聚也。註猶今言拘摟聚也。又牽也。孟子踰東家牆而摟其處子。又五霸者摟諸侯以伐諸侯者也。
摟字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
摟字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lōu］
["Guangyun" Luohou cut, Pinghou, come. ]
["Guangyun" Li Zhuqie, Pingyu, come. ]
Traditional characters for "搂1".
(1) Holding; pulling.
(2) Gather things in front of yourself.
(3) Flick and pull in your direction.
(4) Search.
(5) See "Lusou".
(6) Solicitation. See "Lugging".
(7) Fuck; pull.
(8) One of the fingerings of Fuqin.
(9) Accounting. See "Accounting", "Accounting".
(10) Hoe the ground.
[②]［lǒu］
["Zhengzitong" Lang Douqie]
Traditional characters for "搂2".
(1) Hug, with arms folded.
(2) Used as a quantifier.
hug
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　搂; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 450 09
[Tang Yun] Luohouqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yin Houqie [Zhengyun] Luhouqie,? Yinlou. 【Said the text】Fragment gathering also. Erya huddled together. Note that it is still today's words to hustle and gather together. Also pull it. "Mencius" surpassed the owner's wall and hugged his virginity. And the five tyrants hugged the princes to defeat the princes.　[Tang Yun] Li Zhu Qi [Ji Yun] Long Zhu Qi,? Yin Lou. Also drag also. One said, ambassador Shen Ye. Pass for Lou. Textual research: [[Said the text] Drag and gather also. Also pull it.㩜取也. [Mencius] The five uncles, those who hold the princes to defeat the princes. Also 【Yangtze Dialect】Chuchi is said to be hug. [Mencius] surpassed the east wall and hugged his virgin. 〔〕 　 I would like to press the 袌 Chi that is called the hug. There is no such language in Yangtze dialect. And Mencius's two words "Zhao Zhu" are both taught as "Lian". I would like to change the virgin from You Qianye Zhi Huo Qi to: Erya Huo Ju Ye. Note that it is still in the present language. Also pull it. Mencius crossed the east wall and hugged his virginity. And the five tyrants hugged the princes to defeat the princes.
